home.title: Full Stack Developer
home.description: I specialize in creating complete and scalable solutions, both on the front-end and back-end, using modern technologies and high-performance development tools.

freelance.description: Developed and optimized responsive user interfaces for clients, reducing load times and improving user experience.
freelance.achievement1: Built scalable apps using React, Next.js, Angular, etc.
freelance.achievement2: Designed secure authentication systems with JWT and Google Auth.
freelance.achievement3: Integrated RESTful APIs with Node.js and Express.js.
freelance.achievement4: Managed global states with Redux and Zustand.
freelance.achievement5: Collaborated with agile teams using Scrum methodologies.

noCountry.description: Worked as a Full Stack Developer handling both backend (Node.js, Java) and frontend tasks, contributing to project development and team collaboration.
noCountry.achievement1: Contributed to the development of several full-stack applications.
noCountry.achievement2: Worked with Java for backend and integrated APIs with Node.js.
noCountry.achievement3: Built responsive frontend applications using modern web technologies.
